Articles.Content:
Okay, i'm gonna request a photo, anyone can try it. It's a heritage photo of these three ships, side by side in space, from the front-left view. The Drek Medium Fighter is to be in sepia/black and white (some kind of old-1920s like wash), then in front of it a Drek Mk VIII in Technicolor (that's the best way I can describe it), and the last one (XIII) in front looking normal. The background should be uncluttered (IE just black space). The DMF and the Mk VIII should appear so their rear sections are hidden behind the next ship.

Drek MF (ship farthest back, left): http://www./?i34gvtpucoifsg7

Mk VIII (center): http://www./?3xnjrfjr278786d

Mk XIII (foreground, right): http://www./?ock84c757ki0mlz

My Mock Up (Don't laugh I'm not the best at drawing ):

I can't do what you are asking for, but I can draw quite well, or so I have heard (Earned a trophy for it this year{Year 11}). I could do a cool perspective "tech" drawing if you could provide some screenshots. (My computer can't run your Dreks. Too part heavy.) If you want I will see when I can scan it and upload it if/when I finish.

I can't do what you are asking for, but I can draw quite well, or so I have heard (Earned a trophy for it this year{Year 11}). I could do a cool perspective "tech" drawing if you could provide some screenshots. (My computer can't run your Dreks. Too part heavy.) If you want I will see when I can scan it and upload it if/when I finish.

Yeah, like what he said, you need a screenshot of perspective of your ship that you want
Ship can be made without a screenshot of perspective.
No. We aren't making the ship. We want HIM to post screenshots of HIS craft that HE wants us to draw / edit pictures of.
